summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account for the period of October 1, 2015, to October 31, 2015. It includes various debits and credits, primarily related to payroll and tax fees, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the account statements.

persons.name: Mande Kirby
persons.context: Mande Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 575 Lexington Ave, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account over the month of October 2015.
The account had a starting balance of $160,138.02 and ended with a balance of $130,975.02.
Numerous preauthorized debits were made, primarily for payroll and tax fees, totaling significant amounts.
The document includes instructions for addressing potential errors in account statements.
There are multiple mentions of ADP fees and tax services throughout the transaction details.
